press_button_twice.description: Press the button twice to access camera settings.

press_button_then_wipe.description: Press the button to turn off the camera, then wipe the button to clean it.

press_button_once.description: Press the button one time to turn the camera on.

press_button.description: Press the button to start/stop the camera.

clean_camera_body_again.description: Wipe the camera body again to remove stubborn stains

rotate_camera_left.description: Rotate the camera body to the left to adjust the shooting angle.

clean_camera_body.description: Wipe the camera body to refresh the look of the camera.

rotate_camera.description: Rotate the camera body to adjust the shooting angle.

full_check.description: Press the button, wipe the camera body clean, then rotate the camera body to ensure all parts are working properly

full_clean.description: Clean the whole camera including button and body, press the button once to check its functioning.

clean_and_press_again.description: Wipe the camera body first, then press the button to turn off the camera.

press_and_wipe.description: Press the button to pause the camera, then wipe the camera body to maintain the camera.

clean_camera.description: Clean the camera to ensure lens clarity.

clean_and_press.description: Clean the camera and press the button to start/stop the camera.

press_and_rotate.description: Press the button to start/stop the camera, then rotate the camera body to adjust the shooting angle.
